name: Tabby Turmoil
description:
You can’t stop a cat determined to ruin your whole house, but you can keep them distracted for a while.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50. The theme was "delay the inevitable".

Tools used:

  • Engine: Godot
  • Art: Aseprite
  • Sound: jsfxr & cats from freesound.org
  • Music: Beepbox
  • Color palette: Comfy52 by Bess
